name: Cherry Blossom Wisdom
description: A master and student discuss life under cherry blossoms

conversation.speaker: CHARACTER_2
conversation.text: Master, why do the cherry blossoms bloom for such a short time?

conversation.speaker: CHARACTER_1
conversation.text: Their brevity teaches us about the preciousness of each moment, young one.

conversation.speaker: CHARACTER_1
conversation.text: Like these petals that fall around us, life is fleeting but beautiful.

conversation.speaker: CHARACTER_2
conversation.text: So we should cherish every step we take on this path?

conversation.speaker: CHARACTER_1
conversation.text: Exactly. Each footstep, each breath, each falling petal is a gift.

audioConfig.voiceInstructions: Ancient, wise voice. Speak very slowly with deep gravitas and long, meaningful pauses. Each word carefully chosen, as if sharing profound truths.
Young, eager student. Voice filled with curiosity and respect. Speaking with wonder and reverence for the master's wisdom.
